title: Research
summary: Research is a planned feature coming to Starscape soon™
full_text:
Research
Research is a planned feature coming to Starscape soon™
Research wasa proposed feature by Keth but then dropped in Getting Around Update.
It was supposed to work bylearning new skills would allow you to unlock better turrets and whatnot, but was scrapped later on.
Trivia
You could actually access the Ui, however you could not progress the tree.
